SEARCH
Package sprite

Class Bomb

java.lang.Object
core.Shape
core.Rectangle
sprite.Sprite
sprite.Block
sprite.Bomb
public class Bomb extends Block
A type of block that when mined, causes the player to lose coins and removes adjacent blocks in the mine.

  • Constructor Summary

    Bomb(processing.core.PImage img, int x, int y, int width, int height, int health, int coinsTake)
    Creates a bomb at (x, y) in the window with dimensions width x height.

  • Constructor Details

    • Bomb

      public Bomb(processing.core.PImage img, int x, int y, int width, int height, int health, int coinsTake)
      Creates a bomb at (x, y) in the window with dimensions width x height. Visually represented in the window by img and health sets how resistant the bomb is to being mined and how many coins it will take from the player when it is mined.
      Parameters:
      img - The image that visually represents the block in the window.
      x - The x-coordinate of the bomb block in the window.
      y - The y-coordinate of the bomb block in the window.
      width - The width of the bomb.
      height - The height of the bomb.
      health - The durability of the bomb that makes it take more hits to mine.
      coinsTake - The number of coins the bomb will take away from the player.

  • Method Details

    • blowUp

      public void blowUp(Block[][] block, int i, int j, Gambledorf gd)
      Detonates the bomb which removes adjacent blocks in the mine and causes the player to lose coins.
      Parameters:
      block - The block containing a bomb that the player mined.
      i - The row in the mine in which the bomb is located.
      j - The column in the mine in which the bomb is located.
      gd - The Gambledorf object that will lose coins.

    • act

      public void act(Block[][] block, int i, int j, Gambledorf gd)

      public void takeCoins(Gambledorf gd)
